name: get_shared_items_web_links
description:
Returns the web link represented by a shared link.

A shared web link can be represented by a shared link,
which can originate within the current enterprise or within another.

This endpoint allows an application to retrieve information about a
shared web link when only given a shared link.

if-none-match.description:
Ensures an item is only returned if it has changed.

Pass in the item's last observed `etag` value
into this header and the endpoint will fail
with a `304 Not Modified` if the item has not
changed since.

fields.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the
response. This can be used to request fields that are
not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
fields for the mini representation are returned, additional
to the fields requested.

boxapi.description:
A header containing the shared link and optional password for the
shared link.

The format for this header is as follows.

`shared_link=[link]&shared_link_password=[password]`

$block:
Web links are objects that point to URLs. These objects
are also known as bookmarks within the Box web application.

Web link objects are treated similarly to file objects,
they will also support most actions that apply to regular files.

$ul: **etag**: The entity tag of this web link. Used with `If-Match`
**id**: The unique identifier for this web link
**type**: `web_link`
**name**: The name of the web link
**sequence_id**
**url**: The URL this web link points to
**created_at**: When this file was created on Boxâ€™s servers.
**created_by**
**description**: The description accompanying the web link. This is
**item_status**: Whether this item is deleted or not. Values include `active`,
**modified_at**: When this file was last updated on the Box
**modified_by**
**owned_by**
**parent**
**path_collection**
**purged_at**: When this file will be permanently deleted.
**shared_link**
**trashed_at**: When this file was moved to the trash.
**code**: A Box-specific error code
**context_info**: A free-form object that contains additional context
**message**: More details on the error.
**help_url**: A URL that links to more information about why this error occurred.
**message**: A short message describing the error.
**request_id**: A unique identifier for this response, which can be used
**status**: The HTTP status of the response.
**type**: `error`
